name: Faal Monsevulle
startIntroPart1: Drem Yol Lok, Iccadora. Hi Faal Lot Monsevul Do Faal Monsevulle. Kron Fah Faal Vul!
startIntroPart2: [Greetings, Iccadora. You are the great Monsevul of the Monsevulle. Conquer for the darkness!]
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: Faal Vul Ful Oblaan Hi, Ruth Sul!
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
unique: Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great General] is earned
